      • getRangeOfTagContains

        public static Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getRangeOfTagContains(java.lang.String content,
                                                              java.lang.String plainPattern)

      • getRangeOfTagContains

        public static Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getRangeOfTagContains(java.lang.String content,
                                                              java.lang.String plainPattern,
                                                              int startPosition,
                                                              java.lang.String tagName)

        Find tag which has class or style field contains plainPattern (inside a pair of quotes). If multiple tag found, return the last one.

        Eg.

        • <span style="display:none" ... />
        • <span style="display:none">&0000000000000319.000000<a href="">XYZ</a><img src="xyz.jpg"/></span>
        • <table class="infobox" cellspacing="5" style="border-spacing: 3px; width:22em;">...</table>
        • <sup id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup>

        Parameters:
        content -
        plainPattern -
        startPosition -
        tagName -
        Returns:
        range[begin, end) or null if not found.
